column5: LOL…i get like that reading some stuff on here, I'm like……." Have you been to Lac Seul??……because I've been to Lac Seul".
I like the part where its all quiet in the theatre and he lets one rip. Hahahaha.
The ability to precisely control your farts must be a dis-stink advantage in a space suit!!
Thats just ridiculously funny...cant help but doubt the legitimacy of it but absolutely hilarious nonetheless
That's weird because he was at TIFF watching the movie's debut and loved the movie. He even asked the director how he made it look so real

Eventually, theatre staff was notified, and the Canadian living legend was loudly removed from the cinema. Witnesses report that he did not go quietly. One patron recalled, “The last thing I heard him yelling was, ‘Have you been to space? Because I’ve been to space!’”  I cried a little reading that.
The last paragraph kills me.  Cant help but think that is a marketing ploy for the movie, and a brilliant one at that.
Yikes, I guess we now know the long term effects of working in outerspace!

I guess I'm the only one who thought he acted like an idiot? Not only was he ruining the movie for everyone else in the theater and acting like a complete ass, the ‘Have you been to space? Because I’ve been to space!’” comment sure makes it seem like his 15 seconds of fame got to his head...  Maybe I just woke up on the wrong side of the bed today?
I am pretty sure this is a fake story.  I have a really hard time believing that there is any truth to it.
Of course it's fake hahaha. Very funny
The Beaverton is Canada's version of The Onion, and that one's an instant classic!
you can tell tis a fake story by reading some of the other stories on the right of the page
Oh, Ok. So just slightly less reliable than the Toronto Sun then!!
glad to hear its fake. I'm thinking this guy is a HUGE loser. Like when has Hollywood EVER portrayed something accurately?
Funny thing is I do that all the time. Sports movies. Car chases. Shoot em ups. Fight scenes.
Likely just as often as the news.
